response.answer_text: My favorites albums are: Grimes - Art Angels (2015) This album is the reason why I started listening to music seriosuly, especially indie. It is so intense and different, the use of loud guitars and the strange lyrics can be surprisingly enjoyable;  Radiohead - In rainbows (2007) It is a recent discovery. The band covers different genres and intensities, without losing consistency. My favorite track is “All I Need”;  Beach Boys - Pet Sounds (1966) I describe this as the best album in history. This masterpiece (with a terrible cover) is truly immersible and a complete experience. Some tracks have harps or even bicycle bells. “I could try to be big in the eyes of the world; What matters to me is what I could be to just one girl” - That’s not me.

too hard to single one out but for me is the first BOSTON album . for a debut album it is a masterpiece of music. every cut is fantastic. vocals and musicians are a 10. another is the first CARS album. same as BOSTON . masterpiece of music. those guys hit it out of the park. EAGLES HOTEL CALIFORNIA , SAME AS ABOVE,
